name: Men of Valor
summary: Men of Valor is a first-person shooter video game developed by 2015, Inc. and published by Vivendi Universal Games for the Microsoft Windows and Xbox platforms. Men of Valor is based on the Unreal Engine 2.0 and simulates infantry combat during the Vietnam War.
info:
• 中文名: 越战英豪
  • 音乐: Inon Zur
  • 别名: 勇者无惧：越战
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 2.0
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2004年10月19日
